column5: Our house offers a safe, affordable and comfortable escape from the urban rush in relative proximity to some of San Antonio's main attractions including SeaWorld, Six Flags Fiesta Texas, Government Canyon State Park and UTSA. Located about 25 min from the River Walk, the Alamo, the Missions and other downtown landmarks, our home is also a great staging ground for leisurely drives to the scenic Hill Country nearby.
column8: Your Safe, Affordable, and Comfortable SA Escape
